name: fda-tools
description: AI-powered FDA regulatory assistant with 64 commands -- predicate search, substantial equivalence analysis, submission drafting, Pre-Sub eSTAR/PreSTAR XML generation with multi-pathway support (510k, PMA, IDE, De Novo), PMA Intelligence with comparison engine, clinical data extraction, supplement lifecycle tracking, annual report compliance, post-approval study monitoring, SSED download and 15-section extraction, unified 510(k)/PMA predicate interface, cross-pathway comparison, PMA advanced analytics (clinical requirements mapping, approval timeline prediction, FMEA risk assessment, pathway recommendation), ML-powered review time prediction, supplement approval probability scoring, MAUDE peer comparison with safety signal detection, competitive intelligence dashboards, real-time data pipelines with automated refresh orchestration, FDA approval monitoring with watchlists and severity-classified alerts, smart fingerprint-based change detection with automated pipeline triggers, text similarity scoring (SequenceMatcher/Jaccard/Cosine), temporal trend analysis, cross-product-code section comparison, external data integration hub (ClinicalTrials.gov, PubMed, USPTO Patents), automated data updates, section comparison, and regulatory intelligence
